description.message: Enhance Google‚Ñ¢ search with infinite scroll, server country icons, "View Image" and "Download Image" buttons, and more.

page_indicator_is_visible_label_text.message: Show current page/total number of loaded pages indicators

img_viewer_img_action_bar_is_visible_lab.message: Show image action buttons in the image viewer

preview_img_viewer_img_action_bar_is_vis.message: Show image action buttons in image previews (works only for the first 100 images)

img_viewer_img_action_bar_is_visible_onl.message: Show only when hovering over image.

img_downloads_dir_label_text.message: Path to the images download folder

scroll_to_top_title.message:
Left-click to scroll to the top. (Keyboard: Press Tab to select the button, then press Enter.)

Right-click to scroll to the bottom. (Keyboard: Press Tab to select the button, then press Ctrl + Enter.)

When you scroll to the top or bottom, Search Enhancer for Google‚Ñ¢ remembers your position. To return to this position, middle-click. (Keyboard: Press Tab to select the button, then press Shift + Enter.)

You can also remember your position without scrolling to the top or bottom. To do this, middle-click if Search Enhancer for Google‚Ñ¢ doesn't already have a position remembered. If it does, click and hold the middle button for 0.35 seconds. (Keyboard: Press Tab to select the button, then press Alt + Enter.)

img_downloads_dir_help_text.message: A path to the folder within the Downloads folder where downloaded images will be saved. This path may include subfolders but must not contain characters prohibited by the operating system. If the folder does not exist, it will be created upon the first download. Leave this field empty to save images in the default Downloads folder. Example: !Google/Images.

img_viewer_copy_img_btn_is_visible_help_.message: Not all apps will accept images copied using this button. In such cases, you will need to copy images the traditional way - via the browser's context menu.

jump_to_related_searches_title.message: Left-click to jump to related searches/pagination. Left-click again or middle-click the scroll-to-top button to return to your previous position.

load_end_msg_error_text.message: An error occurred. Google thinks you're a robot. Please reload the page and complete the CAPTCHA to continue.‎

remember_scroll_position_hotkey.message: Remember the scroll position or return to the remembered scroll position

remember_scroll_position_forced_hotkey.message: Remember the scroll position (if Search Enhancer for Google‚Ñ¢ already has a remembered position)
